scripts.mustache-constants:arbitrum-one: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/arbitrum-one.json src/templates/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.codegen:arbitrum-one: yarn prepare:arbitrum-one && rm -rf src/types && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.mustache-constants:base: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/base.json src/templates/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.codegen:base: yarn prepare:base && rm -rf src/types && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.mustache-constants:berachain: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/berachain.json src/templates/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.codegen:berachain: yarn prepare:berachain && rm -rf src/types && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.mustache-constants:mantle: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/mantle.json src/templates/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.codegen:mantle: yarn prepare:mantle && rm -rf src/types && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.mustache-constants:polygon-zkevm: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/polygon-zkevm.json src/templates/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.codegen:polygon-zkevm: yarn prepare:polygon-zkevm && rm -rf src/types && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.mustache-constants:x-layer: mkdir -p src/mappings/generated && mustache config/x-layer.json src/templates/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/generated/constants.ts
scripts.codegen:x-layer: yarn prepare:x-layer && rm -rf src/types && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.separator: echo 'This is meant to separate network-level scripts vs deployment scripts'
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-one: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn codegen:arbitrum-one && graph deploy --version-label=$VERSION --studio dolomite-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-one:ormi: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn codegen:arbitrum-one && graph deploy dolomite-arbitrum --version-label=$VERSION --node https://dolomiteapi.0xgraph.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://dolomiteapi.0xgraph.xyz/ipfs
scripts.deploy:base: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn codegen:base && graph deploy --studio --version-label=$VERSION dolomite-base
scripts.deploy:base:ormi: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn codegen:base && graph deploy dolomite-base --version-label=$VERSION --node https://dolomiteapi.0xgraph.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://dolomiteapi.0xgraph.xyz/ipfs
scripts.deploy:berachain:goldsky: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn codegen:berachain && goldsky subgraph deploy dolomite-berachain/$VERSION --path .
scripts.deploy:mantle: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn codegen:mantle && graph deploy dolomite-mantle --version-label=$VERSION --node https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/ipfs
scripts.deploy:mantle:ormi: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn codegen:mantle && graph deploy dolomite-mantle --version-label=$VERSION --node https://dolomiteapi.0xgraph.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://dolomiteapi.0xgraph.xyz/ipfs
scripts.deploy:polygon-zkevm: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn codegen:polygon-zkevm && graph deploy --version-label=$VERSION --studio dolomite-polygon-zkevm
scripts.deploy:x-layer: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn codegen:x-layer && graph deploy --version-label=$VERSION --studio dolomite-x-layer
scripts.deploy:x-layer:ormi: VERSION=$(cat version.txt) && yarn codegen:x-layer && graph deploy dolomite-x-layer --version-label=$VERSION --node https://dolomiteapi.0xgraph.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://dolomiteapi.0xgraph.xyz/ipfs
